arts.ttl: Angers predicted XI v Lyon: Himad Abdelli to start?
arts.sum: SCO Angers’ talisman, Himad Abdelli, made his first appearance of the Ligue 1 campaign, coming off the bench in a 1-1 draw against FC Metz last weekend. The attacking midfielder…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Angers: Martin Satriano to make his debut, Tyler Morton suspended
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais must do without several players as they prepare to host SCO Angers on Friday night. Tyler Morton, notably, is suspended. The former Liverpool midfielder was harshly sent off…
